messages.subject: Homeschooling Poll at ATT.net
messages.msgSnippet: Care to skew the polls a bit more?  Today s Daily Poll at http://www.att.net/ asks whether homeschooling hurts a child s social development.  Apparently
messages.messageBody:
Care to skew the polls a bit more? Today's Daily Poll at http://www.att.net/ asks whether homeschooling hurts a child's social development. Apparently homeschoolers have been clicking on the "not at all" vote since the poll's presence started circulating among homeschool groups this afternoon, flip-flopping the not-at-all vote to 40% from 20%, and the very-much vote from 40% to 25%!



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
